Name: Rolling Cube
About the game: Introduction to the game: Avoid those obstacles! Can you help the red cube to sprint toward the end while crowding out another pile of obstacles? By only moving from left to right, the excitement of gameplay can reach beyond your wildest imagination. Classic run on plane ground / chasing the time / flying in the sky / endless portal world â€” there must be at least one to keep you non-stop, to let you enjoy the ultimate excitement as you just brush past another obstacle .============================== Features: *Relaxed and scene fitting BGM *Rich scene / level / game mode *Multiple achievement systems / hidden eggs + ultimate eggs ============================== About us About us Kayphoon game studio is composed of a group of high school students who are fond of game production, and rolling cube is our first game produced and released. ==============================
